refnamediv.refpurpose: The configuration API for both Awn proper and Awn applets. include libawn/awn-config-client.h

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A configuration wrapper API that supports both a GConf backend, as well as a GKeyFile-based backend. Used for both Awn proper and its applets.

refsect2.title: AwnConfigClient
refsect2.programlisting: typedef struct _AwnConfigClient AwnConfigClient;
refsect2.para: An opaque structure that facilitates having multiple configuration backends available to Awn.

refsect2.title: AWN_CONFIG_CLIENT()
refsect2.programlisting: #define AWN_CONFIG_CLIENT(obj) (G_TYPE_CHECK_INSTANCE_CAST ((obj), AWN_TYPE_CONFIG_CLIENT, AwnConfigClient))
refsect2.para: Casts a variable/value to be an AwnConfigClient.

listitem.simpara: The variable/value to cast

refsect2.title: AwnConfigClientNotifyEntry
refsect2.para: The structure used to transport data to the notification functions of a configuration entry.

listitem.simpara: The client associated with the entry.
The group name of the entry.
The key name of the entry.
The new value of the entry.

refsect2.title: AwnConfigClientNotifyFunc ()
refsect2.programlisting: void (*AwnConfigClientNotifyFunc) (AwnConfigClientNotifyEntry *entry, gpointer data);
refsect2.para: The callback template for configuration change notification functions.

listitem.simpara: The metadata about the new entry value.
Extra data passed to the callback, as defined in the call to awn_config_client_notify_add().

refsect2.title: AWN_CONFIG_CLIENT_DEFAULT_GROUP
refsect2.programlisting: #define AWN_CONFIG_CLIENT_DEFAULT_GROUP "DEFAULT"
refsect2.para: In the GKeyFile backend, the group name with which "top-level" configuration entries are associated.

refsect2.title: enum AwnConfigValueType
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_NULL = -1, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_BOOL, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_FLOAT, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_INT, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_STRING, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_LIST_BOOL, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_LIST_FLOAT, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_LIST_INT, AWN_CONFIG_VALUE_TYPE_LIST_STRING } AwnConfigValueType;
refsect2.para: Indicates the value type of a particular configuration entry.

listitem.simpara: Indicates that the configuration value type is unknown.
Indicates that the configuration value type is boolean.
Indicates that the configuration value type is float.
Indicates that the configuration value type is integer.
Indicates that the configuration value type is string.
Indicates that the configuration value type is list whose items are booleans.
Indicates that the configuration value type is list whose items are floats.
Indicates that the configuration value type is list whose items are integers.
Indicates that the configuration value type is list whose items are strings.

refsect2.title: enum AwnConfigListType
refsect2.para: Indicates the value type of every item in a configuration entry of type "list".

listitem.simpara: Indicates that the list value type is boolean.
Indicates that the list value type is float.
Indicates that the list value type is integer.
Indicates that the list value type is string.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: AwnConfigClient* awn_config_client_new ();
refsect2.para: Retrieves the configuration client for Awn proper. If none exists, one is created.

listitem.simpara: a singleton instance of AwnConfigClient.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_new_for_applet ()
refsect2.programlisting: AwnConfigClient* awn_config_client_new_for_applet (gchar *name, gchar *uid);
refsect2.para: Creates a configuration client for the applet named in the parameter. If uid is not defined, it is implied that the applet is a singleton.

listitem.simpara: The name of the applet.
The unique identifier for the applet (used for positioning on the dock). Optional value (i.e., may be NULL).
an instance of AwnConfigClient for the specified applet.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_clear ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_clear (AwnConfigClient *client, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Removes all of the configuration entries from the client.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be used.
The pointer to the GError structure that contains an error message on failure.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_ensure_group ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_ensure_group (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group);
refsect2.para: Ensures that the group named has been created in the configuration backend.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client to be queried.
The name of the group.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_notify_add ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_notify_add (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, AwnConfigClientNotifyFunc callback, gpointer data);
refsect2.para: Associates a callback function with a group and a key, which is called when that key's value has been modified in some way.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be used.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
The function that is called when the key value has been modified.
Extra data that is passed to the callback.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_entry_exists ()
refsect2.para: Determines whether the group and key exists in the configuration backend.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be queried.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_get_bool ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean awn_config_client_get_bool (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Retrieves the value (as a boolean) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be queried.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.
a boolean value.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_set_bool ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_set_bool (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, gboolean value, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Changes the value (as a boolean) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be used.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
The new value of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_get_float ()
refsect2.programlisting: gfloat awn_config_client_get_float (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Retrieves the value (as a float) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be queried.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.
a float value.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_set_float ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_set_float (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, gfloat value, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Changes the value (as a float) of the specified group and key. If you need double precision, use a string.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be used.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
The new value of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_get_int ()
refsect2.programlisting: gint awn_config_client_get_int (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Retrieves the value (as an integer) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be queried.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.
an integer value.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_set_int ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_set_int (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, gint value, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Changes the value (as an integer) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be used.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
The new value of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_get_string ()
refsect2.programlisting: gchar* awn_config_client_get_string (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Retrieves the value (as a string) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be queried.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.
a newly allocated string value. The caller is responsible for freeing the memory.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_set_string ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_set_string (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, gchar *value, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Changes the value (as a string) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be used.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
The new value of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_get_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: GSList* awn_config_client_get_list (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, AwnConfigListType list_type, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Retrieves the value (as a GSList) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be queried.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
The value type of every item in the list.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.
a newly allocated list value. The caller is responsible for freeing the memory.

refsect2.title: awn_config_client_set_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: void awn_config_client_set_list (AwnConfigClient *client, const gchar *group, const gchar *key, AwnConfigListType list_type, GSList *value, GError **err);
refsect2.para: Changes the value (as a list of values) of the specified group and key.

listitem.simpara: The configuration client that is to be used.
The name of the group.
The name of the key.
The value type of every item in the list.
The new value of the key.
A pointer to a GError structure, which contains an error message if the function fails.
